EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_PHD & Aridhia_Q314.Follow Up Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining us for our webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for joining us for our customer webinar "Enabling Personalized Healthcare with Biomedical Informatics" last Wednesday, August 27, 2014 with Aridhia. We hope you found the session informative.
Our webinar explored how Aridhia is using Pivotal technology to maximize the potential of existing data within the healthcare system, enabling healthcare providers to inform clinical outcomes from insights gained from complex datasets, and providing a data science safe haven that promotes collaboration between healthcare, academia and industry.
Want to know more? We invite you to watch the replay here or visit our website <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data> to learn more about how Pivotal Big Data solutions can help your organization harness data in a more intelligent and effective way.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
